title: Resolve an Assembly Clash
description: During digital mock-up, a clash is detected between a hydraulic line and an electrical wire bundle. An engineer must resolve it.

tasks.description: Analyze the clash report from the digital mock-up software to understand the location and severity of the interference.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the two interfering components.

tasks.description: Modify the 3D CAD model to re-route the hydraulic line, ensuring it maintains the minimum required clearance from the wire bundle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully modifies the design to resolve the clash.

tasks.description: Issue an engineering change notice to update the installation drawings for the production team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the relevant drawings to reflect the design change.
